parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: If true and the appropriate sheet format anchor point exists, then insert table at this point; if false, then use the values specified for the X and Y arguments as the insertion point

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the revision table annotation

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of this revision table annotation

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBOMConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that you want to use that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

title: ISheet.InsertRevisionTable
signature:
RevisionTableAnnotation InsertRevisionTable( 
   System.Boolean
UseAnchorPoint
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Int32
AnchorType
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
)

parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: If true and the appropriate sheet format anchor point exists, then insert table at this point; if false, then use the values specified for the X and Y arguments as the insertion point

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the revision table annotation

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of this revision table annotation

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBOMConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that you want to use that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

returns: Revision table or null if a revision table on the sheet already exists
remarks:
By default, the revision table templates are in the <
install_dir
>\
lang
\<
language
> folder and have a filename extension of
.sldrevtbt
. The template and table must be of the same type. For example, you would specify
C:\Program Files\SOLIDWORKS\lang\English\standard revision block.sldrevtbt
for TableTemplate if you wanted to insert an English-version of the revision block table template.
